articles.author: Siddharth Vikram Philip, Julie Johnsson
articles.title: Airbus Set for Splashy Paris Debut With 500-Jet IndiGo Order - Bloomberg
articles.description: Airbus SE is poised for a grand entrance at the Paris Air Show, where the European planemaker could announce a record 500-aircraft agreement with Indian carrier IndiGo on the first day.
articles.content:
